website_summaries.verdict: Less expensive models offer similar quality and reliability.  Not worth the extra cost for unreliable wireless features.
pros: Easy to use, lightweight, versatile, and takes beautiful, high-quality pictures
Overall, a solid camera with a good battery life
cons: The wireless SnapBridge feature that transfers images to phones is not always reliable

website_summaries.verdict: Very good photo quality for its class plus performance fast enough to capture kids and pets make the Nikon D3400 A solid choice for a first dSLR.
pros: The Nikon D3400 delivers the image quality and speed that a first-time dSLR buyer should expect
cons: A lot of the small annoyances from previous models remain, including tiny autofocus points in the viewfinder and a nonpersistent self-timer mode
Plus, its Bluetooth-only wireless solution isn't very good

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little camera
customer_reviews.text: First let me preface by saying I am an experienced photographer. I've worked with simple cameras through large format ones.I bought this for my daughter. It is simply an amazing little camera. The lens is super fast, focus is pretty darn good, and pic qualities are awesome. Depending on what you're looking for this camera can be a home run.
customer_reviews.author: Arlen

customer_reviews.title: UPSET!!!
customer_reviews.text: There is a black "dot" that appears in each of my pictures in the exact same spot. I waited to write this review thinking I would get some resolution, but kind of getting a run around. It sucks to pay this much for a new camera and have a black dot in every picture! Does anyone read these?!?!?!?!??! HELP?!?!?!??!?!?!?!?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is an excelente camera.
customer_reviews.text: I give them five stars regards I got a different camera I ordered. I order Nikon D3400, and I got D3500. Was it good or bag? I don't know. There is nothing wrong with the camera o lenses. I still don't understand why I got a D3500 in place of the 3400. I think, "think" this 3500 is a version with fewer futures. It is not what I was promised, advertise. It is different. It seems to me an austere style. And should cost less. Is there somebody that can explain me this? carlosguerrerovals@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Capable to mac (I use for iMovie)...which why I purchased it.  I really like it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to take pictures (the auto setting). Does have ability to take video but it's best to get the highest memory stick possible (in my case I purchased a 32GB). Since it's compatible with Macs, I suggest download all pics/video and erase it from the camera to create free space every time one uses it. Also for prolong times when not in use TAKE THE BATTERY OUT; it may leak the cost for a new one is over $25.00! There is a charger where the battery snaps into the charger; if the LED on the charger remains flashing--DON'T UNPLUG IT!!. It has two USB ports (unfamiliar with the variety) to hook up to any mac device, in this case.
customer_reviews.author: APEX III

customer_reviews.title: Good starter camera
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought this for me as an entry level DSLR camera and I love it! Watched a couple of videos on how to use certain functions played around with some of the settings and I’m taking beautiful pictures with it! The lens that comes with it is a good lens for a starter lens. if you find this camera with the 2 lens bundle it is definitely worth paying a little bit extra for the additional lens you still end up saving a little bit of money buying it in the bundle.
customer_reviews.author: Cager

customer_reviews.title: Motherboard broke after 3 months of use. BEWARE international buyers it comes with a USA only warranty.
customer_reviews.text: The camera broke down after 3 months of very little use (motherboard). Since the product doesn't come with an international warranty my local Nikon authorized reseller (in Guatemala) won't cover it and getting the camera fixed costs nearly the same as buying it brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Arenas

customer_reviews.title: Great combo for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I got this at a special Christmas price, and I have had so much fun with it. I am a novice, and got this to see if I would really use it. I've started bird watching, using the long lens. Now I want a longer-range lens for even better close-ups to see my fine-feathered friends. It's a great all-around camera anyone can use.
customer_reviews.author: Mbl1959

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely amazed by this camera. It has FAR exceeded my expectations. I bought it because I have been dissatisfied with the images produced by my iphone, and I desired higher quality pictures for my first time trip to NYC. I have not been disappointed! Calling myself an amateur photographer would be an overstatement, but this camera has helped me produce quality photographs that are well above my level of experience. It even walked me through steps for taking great pictures in various situations. Do not hesitate to buy. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jmammons

customer_reviews.title: This Camera is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this DSLR camera. It is great and I used it for a digital photography class at my college this semester with ease. It really stood out from the crowd and I was one of the only 2 Nikons in the class. It is great and I love taking images with this camera. The resolution is really crisp and clear, and I do not regret purchasing this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ickes

customer_reviews.title: Unser friendly and makes you look like a pro!
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera a couple years ago and LOVED IT. I decided to give my camera to my son who lives in Germany and get myself a new one to take a class along with my son. I was so worried it would not be as great as my last one as it just didn’t feel as solid. I’m pleased to say I was wrong and it’s amazing, just lighter than its older model. 110% worth EVERY PENNY. It will make even the worst photographer look like a pro!!!
customer_reviews.author: J & D

customer_reviews.title: Love the Camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera for the price. Most DSLR' cameras are more expensive. This is worth the investment. Of note the secondary lens is great!!! This one will not disappoint! A friend who is a professional photographer said it is a great beginner camera for those getting into DSLR! The Nikon name spells quality. However, I purchased the 4 year warranty for accident protection. Never know when something might happen. Love the red color too.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S

customer_reviews.title: Great package & price
customer_reviews.text: I had wanted to upgrade to a DLSR for some time. This package and price point is perfect. The 70-300 lens that I received was unable to auto focus. I didn't use this lens right away so I was not aware of the problem. I had to send it to Nikon to repair under warranty. I'm still waiting to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Scarl8Begonias

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT AS A FIRST CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever DSLR camera. I bought it with the kit lenses, and I noticed immediately that I wasn’t producing the images that I wanted. After doing my homework, I learned that I needed specific lenses to do portrait photography and create the bokeh I was dying to have. (You’ll want to buy a 35mm and 50mm!) Well after only three months, I’ve seen a drastic improvement to my images. For this being my first camera and door to photography, I cannot wait to see what images I’ll produce as I continue to learn in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Saosin

customer_reviews.title: The Next Step for iPhone/Pixel Photographers
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, you will be taking beautiful pictures that put your new phone's camera to shame. We opted for just the 18-55mm bundle and it is perfect for almost all of the shots you would want (besides the obvious long distance telephoto) and it is a heck of a quality lens.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this crop camera
customer_reviews.text: This was my starting camera to learn photography and I do not regret it one bit. I love this camera and still pull it out from time to time. Ive since upgraded to full frame but learned everything I know from this one. This is great for anyone looking to learn or to use for light travel. Pair it with the 35mm at 1.8/f DX and you have an awesome duo. If you plan on upgrading to a full frame eventually get the 50mm 1.8 FX lens and it will act more like an 85mm on the D3400 but can also be used when you go to full.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware.........Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with the quality of this camera and with Nikon. I have had the camera right at 2 years and most of that time it has sat in my closet. I have taken less than 1000 pictures with it and already it needs repairs that will cost $200. The problem is the shutter motor needs to be replaced because it hangs up every couple of shots. Turns out, this is not an uncommon problem with this line of Nikon cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: What Smartbridge problem??
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't purchases phone because of the negative reviews concerning the Bluetooth connectivity to smart phones. I am very happy that I ignored the negative reviews and went with my gut and bought the camera because of its other features. As far as the Smart Bridge operation, I had absolutely no trouble installing it successfully and uploading photos from the camera to my android phone. Perhaps it was the fact that I followed the instructions which for me is a fairly new behavior . So far I'm very happy With the camera and have taken some very nice shots with it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Minny

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly and great camera! Love how it sends all the photos instantly to my phone with the snapbridge app! Beautiful camera. Came with everything mentioned above. I've already used it a bunch in only one day. Def a great choice for beginning photographer or just someone who wants great family photos! Especially of kids who move around so much. I've got tons of photos I never could of gotten with my phone camera. Worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. It is perfect for beginners ( like me) without loosing the professional looking images. I have taken several friends photos and all of them are great using the auto feature, I am still learning manual settings, but I do not think I will grow out of this camera anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Came quicker than I thought it would. Upgrading my D3100 with this and so far I love it. I love that I can send pictures directly to my phone from the camera. Update: after using this for a few days I'm not as impressed as I was before. I still love it, it's lighter than the old one. I have a difficult time with the Bluetooth connection to my phone and then setting it back up doesn't go as smooth as I would like. Since that was a big selling point, I feel "eh" about it. Still a good value for the money, still a good camera, just does not have that WoW factor I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Emily G

customer_reviews.title: Too many buttons, not good instructions
customer_reviews.text: I'm an old SLR B&W film guy, so this is my 1st venture into digital photography. It's OK, but I wish there were a model with interchangeable lenses that didn't have all the totally unnecessary bells and whistles. And there was not a good instruction manual to show me how to use any of them. That said, I know I will have to buy another lens for it. I'm used to something in the 70-200 range.
customer_reviews.author: Reverse Angle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent entry level DSLR
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a basic, entry level DSLR, I highly recommend it. I would also buy a 40mm Nikkor Macro lens for it. I shot everything from portraits, to landscapes to macro with that lens. It is very sharp. The D3400 has enough features to learn with. It produces great images (shoot in raw), has good dynamic range and, when pressed into service can even do some decent astro photography. I used this camera for quite some time before upgrading. It served me very well. I was able to learn and grow as a photographer because this camera had enough features and ability to produce professional grade images.
customer_reviews.author: otter

customer_reviews.title: Best item about this was the deal
customer_reviews.text: Best item about this was the deal, you really can't beat Gold Box Deals, especially for a Christmas gift, and with most of the other reviews that champion this model as a "great first-really-good-camera," I felt I could not go wrong. Shipping was terrific, packaging ample, etc. All the things that you want to see, even came with a nice tripod, something you don't normally buy for yourself unless there's a specific need, so it will be good to have.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good first camera
customer_reviews.text: Son loves. We got this for him last year for Christmas. He was 12 at the time. He uses for videos and instagram. We have not printed pictures, so I can not speak to picture quality. It came quickly and with no problems. It was probably more money than we should have spent on him, but it is the one he researched and wanted. Used my rewards points so it made since to buy from Amazon and not a retail store. Also a lttle cheaper than retail store.
customer_reviews.author: Blondemom99

customer_reviews.title: Camera Sensor broke after a year of use.
customer_reviews.text: Camera sensor didn't last a year. Died while I was travelling and a black spot showed in all pictures. sent it to an authorized Nikon repair shop and they said the sensor had to be replaced. Warranty didn't cover in my country. Not buying another Nikon camera any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Paloma

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Pictures look wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Pictures look wonderful, easy to use and light weight. However...the bluetooth on it sucks! Will not connect to snapbridge. Tried everything....zip, nada, nothing. Very frustrating. **EDIT** won’t work with my iPad Pro but works great with my Samsung S8. So I am pleased!
customer_reviews.author: betsy

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the D3300 for my daughter for Christmas and I later purchased myself the D3400. This camera is really a great product. My pictures come out clear and sharp. This camera also comes with a full Nikon USA warranty which you must register your camera online. I would recommend this camera whether it’s your first Nikon or your fifth.
customer_reviews.author: Angelle225

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excelent photos and automatically download each photo to my cellphone. Great Semi-pro camera for begginers
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Andres Mejia Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera
customer_reviews.text: Perfect camera and lenses, no regrets. I took it to a trip in Europe and took wonderful photos. For comfortable reasons I recommend you to bus the BAGSMART compact camera shoulder bag for SLR/DSLR it is water resistant and completely waterproof With the included raicover, it save my camera in Rome when with no reason started to rain really heavy but my camera stays dry, it is a small bag perfect for traveling, I put in the bag the camera, 18-55mm lens 70-300mm lens charger, a cleaning kit and still has a little bit of room for more things
customer_reviews.author: fmeza1

customer_reviews.title: ... my husband for Christmas and he is absolutely in love with it
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my husband for Christmas and he is absolutely in love with it. We both recommend it for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: So far Its been pretty good. Going to be using it mostly for ...
customer_reviews.text: So far Its been pretty good. Going to be using it mostly for Astro photography and night time shooting. So far its been great for both of those things. I have gotten some decent pictures of the Orion nebula so far.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: It's a fantastic entry level camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a fantastic entry level camera. I love the two lenses. The SnapBridge feature is great and relatively bug-free, with few exceptions. It's a 5-star entry level DSLR, but I wish it could get just a bit sharper images. I rated 5 star because it's clearly marketed as an entry-level, but as far as cameras go, I might rate it 4 star. To be honest, though, I don't have enough camera experience to say that with any degree of certainty. This is my first DSLR, and I stand by my choice of getting it as opposed to the Canon Rebel.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Nichols

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this camera
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this camera. I am an amateur, and this camera is really easy to use and figure out. I also really love the camera-to-phone pairing. It makes sharing my photos to social media, and uploading them to flickr a breeze. No need to hook it up to a computer! I highly recommend if you're in the market for an excellent camera that just about anyone can use with ease.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: (10/10) Beast of a camera, recommended for sure!✔️
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten really beautiful shots with this. I highly, highly recommend to anyone looking to buy a camera with a medium-range budget. I bought it after extensive research and decided this was the best choice for nice nature shots, or close up HD portraits/pictures of people. Few pictures I took with it.
customer_reviews.author: Caden

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. Bought it for a trip to Yellowstone and The Grand Tetons. Work perfectly for our needs. We got great pictures of both mountains and wildlife. The Bluetooth download feature is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: 1st DSLR Camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as she is always taking pictures, might as well have some nice ones. She loves it and is busily learning how to use it. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brady Abdalla

customer_reviews.title: Great camera! Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Easy to use, if you want to start to get in to DSLR photography this camera is perfect. It also has in build guide that lets you know the basic and a bit 'advance' functions. I recommend that you also look up for tutorials online how to better use this camera so you can get the most out of it. Also has bluetooth which allows it to connect to smart devices for easy online upload.
customer_reviews.author: Rok

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner camera
customer_reviews.text: After much research, I settled on this camera to start working on building my photography skills. I found that it was very easy to learn the different features, and the instructions were very helpful once I started shooting in manual. I've done 6 photo shoots with this camera, and have been very impressed with how well it's done.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth G. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I’m no professional by any means, but I’ve been using this for over a year now and I still love how my photography turns out. It’s easy to use, has more features than I expected and it feels great in my hands. And with all the lenses available for this camera, so many styles of photography can be achieved with great results.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner camera
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner camera! I purchased because I liked the wireless transfer feature, which is actually very nice but very slow so be cautious about using it for large transfers. The lens are good. I haven't played with it too much to write a detailed review but the times I have used the camera the quality was good.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Beginner Camera
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this camera from a Nikon Coolpix B3500. I have no complaints considering the point-and-shoot I was using was horrid indoors, and there was no ability to change the aperture. The way this camera takes high quality photos is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Yoan Deng

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this camera is great except the fact that the app for it doesn't work! :(
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Just a biginner
customer_reviews.text: Started with point and shoot about ten years ago. Really got hooked on the photos I was able to take. After 3 Nikon cameras my daughter bought me the Nikon 32000. Bought a book to go with the camera and am still figuring out new things. A couple months ago I bought the 34000 and am amazed at the quality of the photos. So much clearer. I love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: C. SINN

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level DSLR
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level DSLR! Very easy to learn on and takes beautiful pictures. Deducted a star because while snap bridge is a good concept, it's poorly executed.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Warning! The Nikon app does not work with IOS 12
customer_reviews.text: I thought this camera would be great with the feature to transfer the pictures to your device was a big seller. The camera works fine, but I can't pair the camera with my device since the IOS 12 update. Super frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Tavers

customer_reviews.title: Great Entry Level DSLR
customer_reviews.text: Quite an amazing entry level DSLR. This is my first. The dials and buttons are very concise and I have been loving the Guide mode to help me learn about the aperture, shutter priorities and so on. Based on what kind of picture you want to make, the camera will prompt you what to put the settings at. It is so lightweight and the battery lasts forever too. Highly recommended if you'd like to give photography as a hobby a shot (pun intended) :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: A great beginners camera. I have owned this camera since Oct 2017 and feel that If you're serious about photography as a hobby or possibly career this camera is a good one to learn with.With some practice, you can get good images that will make you forget your phone camera.
customer_reviews.author: shawn ray

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: We love our camera! There are so many settings that make it an amazing camera to work with. I like to just keep it on automatic, and takes amazing pictures. My husband plays around with the settings, and takes great pictures as well. It comes with everything you need, but make sure you get a memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, good lens
customer_reviews.text: I also have a D7200 which came with cheap lenses. This camera has a lighter weight than the 7200, takes great pictures and comes with a good lens. I take it with me instead of the 7200. I'll never use all the features of the 7200. If I had a do-over, I'd get just this camera + lens set and buy some additional lenses.
customer_reviews.author: FishMan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent starter pack for art photography
customer_reviews.text: I had a 35mm SLR 40 years ago, and learned photography with that. I bought this because I was getting back into photography as an artistic sideline. It hasn't failed me in a dozen or so professional model shoots, and the manual functions work just as my analog SLR did way back when.
customer_reviews.author: Sunbather

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, lightweight, fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after a lot of deliberation. I’ve used Nikon before and like Nikons. The 3400 is easy to use, lightweight, small, packable, and fun to use. It’s a great little camera to get buck into photography (like me), learn photography, or for non-photographers that want a good camera to help them take better pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good for newcomers
customer_reviews.text: As my first DSLR I wasn't sure what camera to get. I have been satisfied with this model. It's newbie friendly. Controls are easy to learn, battery life is good, both lenses that I got have provided nice results though I have spent a lot of time shooting and learning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome for non professionals who want to get professional quality photos. Got it for my girlfriend and she loves taking pictures of our kids and taking it on vacation with us. For the price you can beat it. Nikon is great and this camera really takes awesome pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: As a novice photographer, this camera does everything I could want it to and more. It takes great photos in the "auto" setting, but has the controls to change and customize the different things if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pederson

customer_reviews.title: The 3300 works much much much better in low light situations
customer_reviews.text: I find I much prefer my Nikon D3300. The 3300 works much much much better in low light situations.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Klotz

customer_reviews.title: Love it, we love to take pictures (we need ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, we love to take pictures (we need to take a course and learn to best use it) I bought it for my wife, yet I use it more...the only regret is that I should have bought the package with the 70-300mm lens for longer range pictures (buy it next)!
customer_reviews.author: Jeorge Jesus Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I will always love Nikon. But why is the picture transfer so slowwwww. I get it's 24MP which are large files but they need to update the app to accommodate the pictures and the size the camera is very light I was shocked it's lighter than the d90. I love it. I really do.
customer_reviews.author: Jannie

customer_reviews.title: When buying electronics, try sellers with a LOT of feedbacks and good reviews! ;)
customer_reviews.text: Bought from Cameta Camera. Everything as described; for a beginners DSLR, it is fantastic! The photos are very sharp and then quality is awesome. Second Nikon I have had and so far, no bad feedback!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Without a doubt a great place to start if your getting into photography
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt a great place to start if your getting into photography. The only complaint I have is that the kit lens included is not all that great. Invest in a prime lens asap. Since I purchased a 50mm prime the kit lens hasn't left my camera bag. The D3400 is a great starter camera. Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Going from an iPhone to this is great. The good news is that it is easy ...
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Going from an iPhone to this is great. The good news is that it is easy to use out of the box. After that, there are tons of options to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, I bought it as an upgrade from my Canon SX50hs. The image quality it's outstanding and blows away the Canon. I would highly recommend this to anyone who wants a step up without killing your wallet. Easy to use and the Snapbridge app is a fantastic addition, go out and buy one today.
customer_reviews.author: sullyfendi

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product, I have been using the camera for a while now and the more I use it and learn about it the more the quality surprises me at this price point. Definitely recommend for any other beginner photographer like me
customer_reviews.author: Z33 driver

customer_reviews.title: Great camera kit
customer_reviews.text: Great camera kit. The D3400 is easy to use for the beginner and yet offers the flexibility needed for more advance use.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: did work great
customer_reviews.text: worked for a while till the mode selector knob fell off in about a year and almost 2 years and about 7000 shots later the kit lens stoped working
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great package!
customer_reviews.text: I was super psyched to see this kit for the price. Having a prime lense is awesome and takes amazing photos, especially in low light. Super good deal. I've always loved Nikon products and have had several of there cameras over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Best Entry Level Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to do my senior project but really used the full extent of it on my graduation trip. The battery lasted me a long time & I was using it a lot. I did charge it every night but during the day the battery life was long! I captured great images! I know some what how to work a camera because I took 2 classes in college but even for beginners this is a great entry level camera. It’s cheap but effective.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera every day of my life . Im veryyy delighted with my purchase ... definately recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MochaLatte

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Lovely camera, my daughter loves it and it's well priced. Lots of fun things to do. I also liked Nikon better, we have always had Canon and this one suited my needs much more than our Rebel did.
customer_reviews.author: Silefer

customer_reviews.title: Merchant selling is not an authorized Nikon dealer an as such Nikon will not warranty the product.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this camera since it is sold by an unauthorized dealer and comes without warranties. This concerned me on several levels.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great camera. Only issue is the app. It says Bluetooth compatible but the feature rarely works correctly.
customer_reviews.author: KH123456

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Took a picture of my fake dusty ol' flower in front of my house and am amazed at the quality of pictures this thing takes. I've never owned an expensive camera and it is extremely easy to figure out and play with. I'm very happy! And SnapBridge is a great app so far as well.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this camera....
customer_reviews.text: I'm consider myself a serious amateur photographer, and I can't say enough good things about this camera. It's light, easy to use, and takes amazingly colorful photos in low light without a flash. I also love that the SnapBridge app sends the photos to my phone automatically, so I can share with friends and family without having to wait to download the photos from the memory card. I still have a lot to learn about its capabilities, but I just ordered another one (body only), so that I can use that one with a 70-300mm VR lens without having to change lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Baker

customer_reviews.title: Charger and battery defective
customer_reviews.text: The battery and battery charger doesn’t work and that is beyond BEYOND frustrating. Was so excited to use my camera and couldn’t because the effing charger is trash. Pissed and had to order a new battery and charger for another 65 Bucks. Aggravated to say the least. There is also nobody to contact to send me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera and Amazon is the Best Way to Order!
customer_reviews.text: First one came DOA but Amazon was great to work with. Two days later the new one arrived and it worked great. I am really enjoying this camera. It has been a while since I had a SLR style camera and I’ve missed it. Truly the pictures are great. You cannot go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera!
customer_reviews.text: What an excellent camera. It wasn't inexpensive, but you get what you pay for and it was worth it! Excellent quality. Far better than using a camera on any phone. Precious item that I use professionally on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Digital Design Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend and now all she wants to do is take photos she started taking amazing photos within a couple of days, and anywhere we go the camera comes with. The auto settings on the camera work great but you can add a lot of personality and a lot better quality with manual. If you're worried about the larger lens because it doesn't have "VR" don't! Pictures come out super sharp even when taking shots offhand. To her the 300mm lens is a must since she enjoys taking photos of wildlife.
customer_reviews.author: Logan T.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I am loving the pictures that this camera takes. Has a broad range of automatic features and allow the experienced photographer plenty of flexibility to set up custom shots.
customer_reviews.author: S. Borden

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it, image quality is beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I cant wait to learn on it and photograph my baby boy. It's very high tech but the preset settings make it much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Raeann warren

customer_reviews.title: Great light camera for all kinds of uses.
customer_reviews.text: I've taken about 100 photos, had it one week and so far so good. I love the light weight feel of this camera. Looking forward to many years of enjoyment with it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Glover

customer_reviews.title: A few pictures from a recent trip; The picture ...
customer_reviews.text: A few pictures from a recent trip; The picture with the windmills was taken in a car while going about 60mph. The fact that it looks so unbelievably still, it incredible. The photo of the bird has not been edited or altered in anyways and it was a solid distance away from us- I used the zoom lens for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Delia Drumm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera. I am just starting out in photography and this camera is perfect to get started. It has everything settling I need and more. Highly recommend the Nikon d3400
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: After dropping my D3100 and wanting a new camera the D3400 was the perfect fit. Came with two lenses. I like the function where you take the photo and it transmits the photo to my phone. So far this is a great camera. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Willapa Harbor Drone

customer_reviews.title: A great deal
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Nikon camera's so this will be my 3rd. I love the blutooth to phone feature, a very simple to use yet high tech piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Boddie

customer_reviews.title: ... photos without having to pay the price of a super expensive camera
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and takes decent photos without having to pay the price of a super expensive camera. I love it and I would take it everywhere with me if I could, not super portable but it makes up for it by taking such great photos! Great for beginning photographers or people w ho don't have a ton of time to learn how to use a manual camera, very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: alchigh.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent except for Snap Bridge.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I give 4 stars instead of 5 is because of Snap Bridge which does not work and is useless. Don’t waste your time trying to install it, just be content to use the SD card to transfer to your computer. I also recommend the Dummies book which is really valuable for explaining how the camera works... you will be quite satisfied with the ease of use and picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Nice present.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the wife since she was wanting to get into photography. She absolutely loves it! Easy to use and the bluetooth to device lets her edit pictures with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pics, WiFi compatible
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter. She loves it, loves the Wi-Fi capabilities. Shoot and send.
customer_reviews.author: Dann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first DSLR camera.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It is my first DSLR and it is easy to learn on, lightweight, and the picture quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: s.f.

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner camera
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner camera. If you want to take photography seriously, spend the extra cash, but for personal photos and casual vacation pictures, this is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly simple for me to learn how to use it and take awesome photos!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a week now and as a complete noob to the DSLR world I am loving how easy this is to learn and use. Go slow, follow instructions, and experiment. It does take some wonderful photos !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it! The ease of using and especially the ...
customer_reviews.text: Being new to photography, I love it! The ease of using and especially the automatic upload of pictures to my phone and the Nikon space.
customer_reviews.author: Geobelle

customer_reviews.title: Love my newest Nikon
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this camera I simply love it. I use it daily and I love the way that it connects with my phone so that I can easily transmitted my photos to customer and also upload them to IG and FB.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: this is a great camera. great price
customer_reviews.text: this is a great camera. great price. took it hiking and it takes great pics of nature, specially with the extended lens.
customer_reviews.author: TinoRZA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price and love that it sinks with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: dwade780

customer_reviews.title: 24.2 Megapixels
customer_reviews.text: Excellent entry-level SLR for the price. I bought a TTL external flash for it and it takes excellent photos.
customer_reviews.author: daveroller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. It is easy to use and the lenses make the pictures even better. I only wish it also came with a micro camera lens to take photos of small close up things.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! Bought this for my Wife when we had our first child. Neither one of us know anything about photography or cameras, but this is simple to use and gives us great quality family photos!
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyS

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the money. Had this for a year now and still love it. Great Digital SLR especially for those just getting started.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: Nice entry level camera and a great price. The wife loves it and it takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: I love the way my daughter sees the world
customer_reviews.text: I love the way my daughter sees the world. She loves the way she gets to share it with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nikon D3400 w/ AF-P DX NIKKOR 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G VR (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:w/ 18-55mm| Configuration:BaseBefore the Nikon D3400 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm Lens (Black), you chose your smartphone camera for convenience. Zooming was clumsy. Shooting in low light was nearly impossible. Capturing fast action was a game of luck. But after the D3400, you'll see that you were compromising image quality. That some of the greatest photos happen when the light is low. That fast action can be frozen in perfect clarity. And that a camera and a smartphone can work together in harmony to make the photos you share absolutely amazing. Features: Stunning simplicity - Photos and videos captured with the D3400 and a superb NIKKOR lens are as vibrant and lifelike as the moments they preserve. Shoot in extremely low light without a problem. Freeze fast-action in its tracks. Create portraits with rich, natural skin tones and beautifully blurred backgrounds. The photos you share will amaze everyone-even yourself. Camera, smartphone and cloud in perfect harmony - SnapBridge has changed the way cameras and smartphones work together-and only Nikon has it. Take a picture with the D3400 and it’s automatically transferred to your compatible smartphone or tablet, ready to share. SnapBridge works seamlessly with NIKON image space, a cloud storage and sharing site, to back-up your photos and to help you create and share albums with your friends and family. The future of photo sharing is here. A camera designed for you - Compact and lightweight, the D3400 is designed to go everywhere you go. Even first-time DLSR owners will quickly feel at home-the camera's controls are smartly laid out for comfort and intuitive control. The bright optical viewfinder provides a sharp, glare-free view of the world, and the comfortable grip enables precise handling. The gateway to better photography - The D3400 makes photography easy and fun, freeing you to focus on your natural talents-framing great shots, anticipating special moments and finding unique perspectives in everyday scenes.
feature_bullets: No optical low pass filter. Bluetooth specification version 4.1. Wi-Fi functionality eye fi compatible
Native ISO 100 25600; 5 fps shooting. Compatibility information: c firmware v. 1.10 and later ( released august 31, 2016 )
